Employee: Karmani Naidoo
Report Date: 2025-02-25
Doctor: Dr Serisha Latchmiah
Nurse: Lebo Cindi
Clinical Recommendations: Allergic rhinitus - Avamys, Rupanase prescribed
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
Recent MRI noted Fibroids in Uterus - awaiting Gynae consultation
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha
Comment Key: ChronicMedicationList
Comment Value: Crestor 5mg , Texa

Clinical Recommendations: Allergic rhinitus - Avamys, Rupanase prescribed
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a Radiologist for a screening mammogram- Referral letter provided
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

Recent MRI noted Fibroids in Uterus - awaiting Gynae consultation
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

------------------------------
Employee: Karmani Naidoo
Report Date: 2025-02-25
Doctor: Dr Serisha Latchmiah
Nurse: Lebo Cindi
Clinical Recommendations: Allergic rhinitus - Avamys, Rupanase prescribed
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
Recent MRI noted Fibroids in Uterus - awaiting Gynae consultation
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

As discussed it is a good idea to have the mole on your leg checked out. 
Kindly book optometrist appointment with regards to screening eye tests.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a Radiologist for a screening mammogram- Referral letter provided
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha
Comment Key: ClinicalExamComment
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: None

Doctor: Dr Serisha Latchmiah
Nurse: Lebo Cindi
Clinical Recommendations: 
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a Radiologist for a screening mammogram- Referral letter provided
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a Radiologist for a screening mammogram- Referral letter provided
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
Recent MRI noted Fibroids in Uterus - awaiting Gynae consultation
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
Recent MRI noted Fibroids in Uterus - awaiting Gynae consultation
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha
Comment Key: ClinicalExamRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: None

There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: None

Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha
Comment Key: CurrentComplaintRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: None

It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

Doctor: Dr Serisha Latchmiah
Nurse: Lebo Cindi
Clinical Recommendations: Allergic rhinitus - Avamys, Rupanase prescribed
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
Recent MRI noted Fibroids in Uterus - awaiting Gynae consultation
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha
Comment Key: LabTestRecommendation
Comment Value: Improving on your cholesterol containing foods will provide an added benefit in conjunction with your cholesterol-lowering medication. As we discussed, Inositol is a good supplement which can help with improving your insulin resistance which often comes from central adiposity.
Special Investigation Notes: None

Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a Radiologist for a screening mammogram- Referral letter provided
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha
Comment Key: LifestyleNote
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: None

Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
Recent MRI noted Fibroids in Uterus - awaiting Gynae consultation
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha
Comment Key: LifestyleRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: None

There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha
Comment Key: MedicalHistoryNote
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: None

Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a Radiologist for a screening mammogram- Referral letter provided
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha
Comment Key: MedicalHistoryRecommendation
Comment Value: Known Hypercholesterolaemia on treatment.
Significant family history of cardiovascular disease.
Special Investigation Notes: None

As discussed it is a good idea to have the mole on your leg checked out. 
Kindly book optometrist appointment with regards to screening eye tests.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
Recent MRI noted Fibroids in Uterus - awaiting Gynae consultation
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

As discussed it is a good idea to have the mole on your leg checked out. 
Kindly book optometrist appointment with regards to screening eye tests.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a Radiologist for a screening mammogram- Referral letter provided
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

Comment Value: None

It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

Kindly book optometrist appointment with regards to screening eye tests.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
Recent MRI noted Fibroids in Uterus - awaiting Gynae consultation
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha
Comment Key: MentalHealthNote
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: None

Kindly book optometrist appointment with regards to screening eye tests.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
Recent MRI noted Fibroids in Uterus - awaiting Gynae consultation
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha
Comment Key: MentalHealthStressRecommendation
Comment Value: Stress is a positive motivator for you and you noted that you generally feel stressed during busy periods at work. Remember to prioritise your mental health even in those periods to help you to cope with stress.
Special Investigation Notes: None

Clinical Recommendations: Clinically there are no red flags that I'm immediately concerned about. 
As discussed it is a good idea to have the mole on your leg checked out. 
Kindly book optometrist appointment with regards to screening eye tests.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a Radiologist for a screening mammogram- Referral letter provided
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

Dr Serisha
Comment Key: SpecialInvestigationRecommendation
Comment Value: I'd suggest increasing your cardiovascular exercises to take it to the next level.

As discussed it is a good idea to have the mole on your leg checked out. 
Kindly book optometrist appointment with regards to screening eye tests.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
Recent MRI noted Fibroids in Uterus - awaiting Gynae consultation
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha
Comment Key: SymptomScreeningNote
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: None

Doctor: Dr Serisha Latchmiah
Nurse: Lebo Cindi
Clinical Recommendations: 
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
Recent MRI noted Fibroids in Uterus - awaiting Gynae consultation
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha

Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a Radiologist for a screening mammogram- Referral letter provided
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha
Comment Key: VitalsRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: None

Clinical Recommendations: Allergic rhinitus - Avamys, Rupanase prescribed
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
Recent MRI noted Fibroids in Uterus - awaiting Gynae consultation
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha
Comment Key: VitaminsOrSupplements
Comment Value: Vitamin D , Vitamin C , Vitamin B co , Probiotics , Calcium , Omega 3 , Quercetin , Septoguard

Special Investigation Notes: None
------------------------------
Employee: Karmani Naidoo
Report Date: 2025-02-25
Doctor: Dr Serisha Latchmiah
Nurse: Lebo Cindi
Clinical Recommendations: 
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
Recent MRI noted Fibroids in Uterus - awaiting Gynae consultation
Overview Notes: Thank you for allowing us to help you identify any health concerns with this personalized screen. There are no major red flags that need to be addressed immediately, rather refine your everyday lifestyle choices for improved future health. These adjustments take a good 3-6 months to show change. We need to keep a regular eye on your cholesterol and cardiovascular health given your family history. Please do make use of the referral letters sent via email to investigate the mole on your leg further as well as the screening mammogram. It was a pleasure giving you feedback for your comprehensive medical! Should you have any queries, don't hesitate to reach out. 
Dr Serisha
